goals__remit:
The objective of KDC Conseil is to work together with its clients to help them define and implement their strategy to determine their positioning and influence.  
 
We are at the service of the client; we do not replace the client's teams but do strengthen their competences, their analysis and their means of intervention.  
 
In more precise terms, we offer the following services: 
- strategic advice and monitoring 
- reputation 
- representation of interests and influence 
- training
customers: S.W.M# TEREOS# F.C.B. Fédération Nationale des Coopératives de Collecte et de Transformation de la Betterave
